name: [GW12 Jam] CRAZY TRACTOR
description:
A rival farmer is trying to muscle in on the lucrative chicken and corn business. Use your tractor to put an end to their venture.

Features:

  • 1 level of fast-paced antitrust action
  • Terrible lo-fi visuals and sound
  • Realistic physics-based chicken simulations
  • Easy to uninstall

Created in a week for the Godot Wild 12 game jam. Get the source here.
